title: Can't install the game
body:
I downloaded the game and when I click open or run as admin, I wait for minutes and nothing happens.
When i try to open/run as admin again, it says another instance is already running. Please help. Thank you.

replies.body:
It sounds like League is trying to open after you ran it as admin, but for some reason gets stuck without actually opening. When you try to run it again, the process is still active so it won't let you launch it again.

Open your task manager, click on processes, and end all of the League processes to make sure none of them are still running. Then right click on your LoL shortcut, click on compatibility, and at the bottom turn on run as administrator. Once you've done that, go ahead and try running LoL again and let me know how it works!
